summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing the preparation of plans, specifications and cost estimates for modernization of traffic control devices at the intersection of Fremont Avenue North with North 34th and North 35th Streets, enlargement and improvement by decorative paving of the traffic island at Fremont Avenue North and North 34th Street, and upgrading of street lighting upon Fremont Avenue North from North Nickerson Street to North 34th Street; and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Arterial City Street Fund therefor.
